title: United States Plunges in Economic Freedom Rankings, Study Reveals
description: American television presenter and author, John Stossel, released a video on June 20, 2023, where he delved into the findings of a recent study on global economic freedom. Conducted by the Heritage Foundation and unveiled in late February, the research unveils a stark reality: the United States has experienced a substantial decline in economic freedom. […]

title: FTX scandal exposed: Misuse of customer deposits revealed in second investigative report
description: FTX, once hailed as a customer-focused leader in the digital age, is now under intense scrutiny following the release of a damning investigative report by FTX debtors. The report uncovers shocking revelations of the commingling and misuse of customer deposits at the now-defunct crypto exchange. The former senior executives at FTX Group are accused of ... Read more
